actions.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Posey.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to redirect $1,969 in NASAs Exploration account to highlight the 50th anniversary of the Apollo 11 mission to the Moon and back, which launched from Kennedy Space Center in Cape Canaveral, Florida.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to redirect $1,969 in NASAs Exploration account to highlight the 50th anniversary of the Apollo 11 mission to the Moon and back, which launched from Kennedy Space Center in Cape Canaveral, Florida.
